detail_description: La Casa de La Playa is a popular beachfront fish restaurant located in Costa Teguise, Arrieta. It's advisable to arrive early as it tends to get crowded, especially with locals. The menu offers delightful options such as Puntillas de Calamares and fresh seafood platters. Despite its unassuming exterior, the restaurant is always bustling with activity. The staff may have limited English skills, but this adds to the charm of the place.
name: La Casa de La Playa
address: C. el Lajero, 1C, 35542 Haría, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant marina of Arrecife, Restaurante Lilium is a culinary gem run by a passionate husband-and-wife duo. This charming eatery has garnered attention for its exceptional quality and reasonable prices, earning it a Michelin Bib Gourmand commendation. The menu showcases an array of beautifully presented dishes crafted from locally sourced ingredients like succulent scallops, fresh tuna loin, and tender suckling pig.
name: Restaurante Lilium
address: Marina Lanzarote, Av. Olof Palme, S/N, Centro Comercial, 35500 Arrecife, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Typical regional grills & ceviche in a 19th-century house with a tree-shaded terrace.
detail_description: La Bodega de Santiago is a charming restaurant located in a 19th-century house with a lovely tree-shaded terrace. It offers typical regional grills and delicious ceviche, making it a perfect spot to enjoy authentic local cuisine. The restaurant has received positive feedback for its great food and friendly service, although some find it slightly expensive. Overall, it's known for serving excellent tapas in a delightful setting, making it a must-visit dining destination in Yaiza.
name: La Bodega de Santiago
address: C. Montañas del Fuego, 27, 35570 Yaiza, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Steaks, lamb chops & fish grilled over coal & wood fires, served in a cozy, stone-lined dining room.
detail_description: La Cascada Restaurant, located in the heart of Puerto del Carmen's Old Town, offers a cozy and inviting dining experience. The restaurant shares a spacious area with its sister restaurant, Bodega, making it ideal for larger groups and special occasions. With a team trained in merchandise control and dedicated to innovation, La Cascada prides itself on offering traditional yet innovative dishes.
name: La Cascada Restaurant
address: C. Roque Nublo, 3, 5, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the charming town of Tiagua, Restaurante El Tenique offers a delightful dining experience with both indoor and outdoor seating options. The sunny terrace is perfect for enjoying meals during warm weather. The menu showcases an array of local delicacies, including artisan cheeses, savory goat meat stew, refreshing ceviche, and expertly grilled seafood. Visitors often appreciate the friendly atmosphere that makes it a popular spot for locals celebrating special occasions.
name: Restaurante El Tenique
address: Av. Guanarteme, 100, 35558 Tiagua, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Unique volcanic tunnel & caverns featuring an underground concert hall, restaurant & salt lake.
detail_description: Jameos del Agua is a unique attraction located in Lanzarote, featuring volcanic tunnels and caverns that house an underground concert hall, restaurant, and salt lake. Designed by local artist Cesar Manrique, this masterpiece combines nature and art to create a feeling of harmony. Visitors can sample contemporary dishes at the restaurant while admiring the extraordinary natural setting inside a cave created by a volcanic eruption.
name: Jameos del Agua
address: LZ 204, Parcela 109, Carretera Arrieta - Órzola S/N Lanzarote, LZ-204, 109, 35542 Punta Mujeres, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Bright restaurant serving Mediterranean-inspired international dishes using regional ingredients.
detail_description: La Puerta Verde is a vibrant restaurant located in a serene part of town, offering a diverse menu of Mediterranean-inspired international dishes made with locally sourced ingredients. The restaurant provides both indoor and outdoor seating options, along with ample parking facilities. Guests can expect friendly and attentive staff to enhance their dining experience. With an array of menu choices and a selection of local wines, La Puerta Verde is a popular choice among visitors, often requiring advance booking due to its popularity.
name: La Puerta Verde
address: C. Fajardo, 24, 35520 Haría, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante Naia Lanzarote, located in the heart of Arrecife, offers a delightful dining experience with its Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. The restaurant's interior, designed by the MT Architecture and Design Studio, is as captivating as its menu. The elegant presentation of dishes like micuit foie gras and Saharan squid on potato puree reflects the attention to detail at Naia.
name: Restaurante Naia Lanzarote
address: Av. César Manrique, 33, 35500 Arrecife, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Puerto del Carmen, Taberna De Nino is a delightful Spanish eatery that captures the essence of local cuisine. This charming tavern is renowned for its mouthwatering tapas and traditional Canarian dishes, such as the beloved papas arrugadas con mojo and calamares a la plancha. The inviting atmosphere makes it perfect for sharing plates with friends or family while savoring vibrant flavors.
name: Taberna De Nino
address: C. Timanfaya, 2, Local 10 Centro Comercial, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Creative use of seasonal Lanzarote ingredients in a chic, modern space run by a husband & wife team.
detail_description: Restaurante La Cocina de Colacho is a chic and modern dining spot located just outside Playa Blanca in the Marina Rubicon area. Run by a husband-and-wife team, this restaurant offers an open kitchen where diners can witness the culinary magic happening. The menu features expertly prepared dishes created by Lanzarote-born chef Nicolas Machin, also known as Colacho.
name: Restaurante La Cocina de Colacho
address: C. Velázquez, 15, 35580 Lanzarote, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurant Casa Carlos is a popular dining spot located in Playa Blanca Lanzarote, offering a modern and bright interior with stunning ocean views. The menu features a variety of Mediterranean dishes including fish, meat, pizza, and pasta, as well as modern options like the highly recommended curry prawns paired with local white wine. The warm and welcoming atmosphere created by Carlos and his staff makes it an ideal choice for visitors.
name: Restaurant Casa Carlos
address: Puerto Marina Rubicon, C. el Berrugo, 2, Local 27A, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante El Navarro is a family-run restaurant that offers fine dining with a focus on European, Mediterranean, and Spanish cuisine. The warm goats cheese with beetroot and the spicy chocolate brownie are highly recommended dishes. It's popular among both locals and tourists, so it's advisable to make reservations well in advance. The restaurant provides a first-class dining experience and is known for its Mediterranean feast.
name: Restaurante El Navarro
address: Av. del Mar, 19, Local 13, 35508 Costa Teguise, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: The Mercado Municipal de Abastos de Haría is a charming local market located next to the village church, open every weekend from 10:00 to 14:00. It offers a variety of locally produced goods including fruits, vegetables, jams, wine, cheese, and artisan crafts. The indoor market also houses a popular restaurant serving authentic Lanzarote dishes such as garlic soup with ham and goat stew.
name: Mercado Municipal de Abastos de Haría
address: C. Barranco de Tesnesia, 2A, 35520 Haría, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Rustic winery, tapas restaurant & guesthouse set amid the lava rock landscape of La Geria park.
detail_description: El Chupadero Lanzarote is a charming establishment located in the unique landscape of La Geria park in Lanzarote. It offers a combination of a rustic winery, tapas restaurant, and guesthouse amidst the striking lava rock surroundings. The village of La Geria provides an incredible backdrop with its green vines and palms set against the black volcanic ash, creating a dramatic contrast.
name: El Chupadero Lanzarote
address: La Geria, 3, 35570, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: La Chalanita is a well-established Mediterranean restaurant located by Playa Blanca beach, offering stunning ocean views and a memorable dining experience, especially during sunset. The restaurant's classic menu caters to seafood lovers and vegetarians alike, earning it a strong reputation over the years. Visitors can enjoy watching the chefs prepare paellas in front of them, adding an entertaining element to their meal.
name: La Chalanita
address: Av. Marítima, 73, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Be Papagayo - Chiringuito is a renowned beach restaurant situated on the stunning Papagayo Beach in Lanzarote. It offers a perfect setting to enjoy high-quality tapas made from local ingredients, along with refreshing cocktails and ambient music. The restaurant is known for its well-presented and served food, specializing in rice dishes such as the exquisite black ink paella.
name: Be Papagayo - Chiringuito
address: Parque natural los Ajaches, 35580 Playa papagayo, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Cofradía de Pescadores Restaurante is a highly recommended restaurant in Playa Blanca, specializing in fresh fish dishes. Visitors rave about the mussels, garlic prawns, paella, and mixed fish grill. The seafood is described as incredibly fresh and delicious. Guests also praise the friendly and welcoming staff, with special mention of Luis for his exceptional service with children.
name: Cofradía de Pescadores Restaurante
address: C. del Chinchorro, s/n, 35580 Playa Blanca, Las Palmas, Spain

excerpt: Outdoor restaurant serving seafood plates on a simple terrace overlooking the ocean.
detail_description: Bar Cafeteria El Pisquito is a small but highly recommended outdoor restaurant located in Arrieta, offering seafood tapas, octopus, limpets, and fresh fish. Despite its size, the staff's dedication ensures a great dining experience. The simple terrace overlooks the ocean and provides a perfect setting to enjoy their delicious grilled squid and sardines at reasonable prices.
name: Bar Cafeteria El Pisquito
address: C. la Noria, 6, 35542 Arrieta, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Jameos del Agua Restaurante is a unique dining experience located in Lanzarote. Set within a stunning cave, the restaurant offers an unforgettable atmosphere designed by Cesar Manrique. The food is delicious and the service is smooth, making for an enjoyable evening. Visitors can also enjoy a free concert after dinner. Despite being a tourist hotspot, the restaurant manages to create a peaceful and beautiful ambiance with soft music and lovely views.
name: Jameos del Agua Restaurante
address: Calle de Jameos del Agua, s/n, 35542 Punta Mujeres, Las Palmas, Spain

detail_description: Restaurante El Diablo is a unique dining experience located in the heart of Timanfaya Park, an area formed by volcanic eruptions. Designed by renowned architect Cesar Manrique, the restaurant offers a 360-degree panoramic view of the surrounding volcanoes and rock formations. What sets this eatery apart is its method of cooking - using the natural heat rising from the volcano to grill meat and fish dishes. Guests can even witness their meals being cooked in this extraordinary manner.
name: Restaurante El Diablo
address: Montaña del Fuego, Carretera general Yaiza-Tinajo s/n, 35570, Diseminado Islote Hilario, 1, 35560 Tinajo, Las Palmas, Spain
